title: U.S.A Sales Taxes per Zip Code
tool_name: U.S.A Sales Taxes per Zip Code

api_list.name: /{zip_code}
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://u-s-a-sales-taxes-per-zip-code.p.rapidapi.com/33166"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "u-s-a-sales-taxes-per-zip-code.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://u-s-a-sales-taxes-per-zip-code.p.rapidapi.com/{zip_code}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "u-s-a-sales-taxes-per-zip-code.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
